title: MSI Big Plays
body: Sorry if this is the wrong place for this but this is my first post. I was just wondering why is there a daily limit on the MSI Big plays enhanced mystery gifts you can buy?

replies.body:
It does appear that the daily limit has been set to 3 for the multiplier affected mystery purchases. The limit for regular mystery purchases is actually 10.

I'm not sure if this is intentional or a misconfiguration in the store. I'll chase this up and see what I can find out.

Confirmed! You should be able to purchase more than 3 mystery skins, I believe the limit should be 10. We've made it possible to purchase more, but currently there is an error when attempting to purchase more than 6. We've let the store teams know so hopefully they can resolve that issue soon as well.

Otherwise, thanks for raising this issue to us!
